WorkItem.ClosedComment: I've decided not to implement this, if the goal is for quicker stat comparison this should be done in a different way.
WorkItem.Description: I could be a useful feature for comparing changes in stats quickly. I do not know if it has a limitation preventing it being there.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] No Mastery multiplier in Effects tab.

Comments.Message:
There's also no crit chance multiplier.

I guess it might be useful if crit rating, haste rating, intellect were adjustable. (not only the end result of their effect)
Just to make sure, you'd like a multiplier on total mastery and crit chance, not an additive stat.
